SELECT gs.goods_num, gs.goods_category, gs.goods_title, gs.goods_content, gs.user_num, gs.goods_price, gs.goods_inventory, gs.goods_view, gs.image_folder_num, i.image1 FROM goods gs LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON gs.image_folder_num = i.image_folder_num WHERE 1=1
AND gs.goods_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{goods_title},'%')
AND gs.goods_category LIKE CONCAT('%',#{goods_category},'%')

SELECT gs.goods_num, gs.goods_category, gs.goods_title, gs.goods_content, gs.user_num, gs.goods_price, gs.goods_inventory, gs.goods_view, gs.image_folder_num, i.image1 FROM goods gs LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON gs.image_folder_num = i.image_folder_num WHERE gs.goods_num = #{goods_num}

SELECT A.category, COALESCE(B.CNT, 0) cnt FROM ( SELECT '전체보기' AS category FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '과일' AS category FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '야채' AS category FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '견과류' AS category FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '곡물' AS category FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '씨앗' AS category FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '농기구' AS category FROM DUAL ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN goods_category IS NULL THEN '전체보기' ELSE goods_category END goods_category , COUNT(D.goods_category) CNT FROM ( SELECT goods_num, goods_category FROM goods ) D GROUP BY D.goods_category with rollup ) B ON A.category = B.goods_category
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods(goods_category, goods_title, goods_content, user_num, goods_price, goods_inventory, goods_view, image_folder_num) VALUES (#{goods_category}, #{goods_title}, #{goods_content}, #{user_num}, #{goods_price}, #{goods_inventory}, #{goods_view}, #{image_folder_num})
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET goods_category = #{goods_category}, goods_title = #{goods_title}, goods_content = #{goods_content}, goods_price = #{goods_price}, goods_inventory = #{goods_inventory}, goods_view = #{goods_view}, image_folder_num = #{image_folder_num} WHERE goods_num = #{goods_num}
